name: 龙皇
description: 龙族之王，拥有毁灭性的力量和无上的威严。传说它能活上千年，见证王朝的兴衰。

features: 深紫色的鳞片带有金色光泽
巨大的双翼如同黑夜天幕
口中能喷出毁灭性的龙炎

ecology.habitat: 最高的山巅和远古龙穴

image_prompts.design: A majestic dragon king with dark purple scales shimmering with gold. Massive wings like night sky, crown-like horn array on head, breathes devastating dragon fire. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on scales and horns, ink sketch texture on wing membranes, non-reflective surface with matte purple and gold tones, legendary and awe-inspiring.
